title: Filing of returns
context: ยง237D-8 Filing of returns. All monthly, quarterly, semiannual, and annual returns shall be transmitted to the office of the taxation district in which the taxes arose or to the office of the first taxation district in Honolulu. [L 1986, c 340, pt of ยง1; am L 1988, c 241, ยง8; am L 1998, c 156, ยง22]
